data.name: Codename Nemesis
data.detailed_description:
Codename Nemesis is an indie, top-down, action/stealth RPG set in a 70's noir-themed world with story-rich movie-styled cinematics and retro low poly, comic book style graphics.

Follow Sam, a goofball hitman through a dark city filled with scum as he tries to find his friend, Neil, who's in the wind after the alleged assassination of their boss, a powerful crime lord. With every goon in the city wanting Sam and Neil dead, our hero takes off into the dead of night in search of his brother while eventually coming face to face with his ultimate nemesis.

Watch out for:

White Underpants

Sneaky Stealth

Mindless Action

Immersive Storyline



Slippery Banana Peels!?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4400 (3.1 GHz) / AMD FX-6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750TI / AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board
  • Additional Notes: Screen/Monitor that supports 4:3, 16:10, 16:9 and 21:9 resolutions

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX El Captain
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/ 1024 MB RAM (not recommended for Intel HD Graphics cards)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board
  • Additional Notes: Screen/Monitor that supports 4:3, 16:10, 16:9 and 21:9 resolutions

content_descriptors.notes:
Language: MIld innuendos in dialogues during some cut-scenes.

Alcohol & Tobacco: Reference to consumption of alcohol and smoking depicted by characters in-game and cut-scenes.

Violence: Mild realistic violence.
